name: Heavy Industries
description:
Tired of wasting days and nights on your common, boring job?

Join Heavy Industries™ and become one of our proud employees!

Benefits include:

  • -Flooding rooms
  • -Heavy construction material falling
  • -Evil managers
  • -Dirty code!
Do not hesitate and contact now our human resources team

This company has room for up to infinite simultaneous workers and one evil boss. You can join us with either a keyboard, a gamepad or a mobile via happyfuntimes.

RECOMMENDED PLAYERS: 4-∞

IMPORTANT: RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR TO ENABLE MOBILE PLAY THROUGH HAPPYFUNTIMES.NET

GOALS

BOSS:
Crush all workers

WORKERS:
Bring that boss down

CONTROLS

BOSS PLAYER (make lines to activate frenzy mode)

  • Keyboard: W, A, S, D

WORKER PLAYERS (jump repeatedly agains walls to climb)
  • Keyboard: Arrow Keys
  • GamePad: Arrow keys + A button + B button
  • Mobile: Hit play and open "happyfuntimes.net" on your mobile

LudumDare entry page
